Quest.Name: They Don't Know What They've Got Here
By the Light of the Stars

CustomBehavior.Text: You are on the wrong continent!

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Kill the Pit Master

Watch out for the croc eggs in last phase

Press continue after he's dead and I'll fly you back

PickUp.QuestName: By the Light of the Stars

Objective.QuestName: By the Light of the Stars

TurnIn.QuestName: By the Light of the Stars

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Talk to Salhet and help him

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Talk with the sergeant and defend the city

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Fly over the sparklies, use the Hologram while on mount, then disable clusters and bomb bots

Press continue when you're done

Don't go far, you get to command the fireball next!

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Get in the ball and then run around and catch gnomes on fire
Stay out of the water

Get out of vehicle, mount your flier and press continue when done, I'll fly you back

Don't go too far, you have an escort quest soon

TurnIn.QuestName: They Don't Know What They've Got Here

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Jump in the Siege Tank, kill 7 giants, press continue

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Use the cloak and then sabotage the powder kegs while stealthed without dying. Watch for the dragon!\n\nWatch the cutscene :D

TurnIn.QuestName: See You on the Other Side!

CustomBehavior.Text: Help the bot kill the big guy
